alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau and southeastern Camden Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Kings Bay Base to near Callahan. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, Cumberland Island and Harrietts Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
